sentence: Fellow far-right Congressman Jim Jordan of Ohio told National Review he supported the move to block Disney’s copyrights.
author: Bevan Hurley
title: Congressional Republicans may block Disney copyright after ‘Don’t Say Gay’ bill row

sentence: Ohio Republican Rep. Jim Jordan, along with several other House Republicans, is threatening to allow Disney's copyright on Mickey Mouse to lapse as early as next year.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Right-wing protesters attempt Disney World "blockade" in support of "Don't Say Gay" law

sentence: But Congress should not add to Disney’s 90+ years of federal copyright protection to incentivize its new far left agenda,” Rep. Jim Jordan said.
author: Daniel Greenfield
title: Beating Woke Hollywood Means Taking Away Their Copyright Gated IP Empires
